content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

1. What is the Current Market Regime?
RISK-ON: low volatility 22.7% with full participation (breadth 8/8); broad bull confirmed. Expect pro-cyclical leadership and risk appetite to persist near-term.

2. Which sectors are leading?
Technology & Telecom leading: TCELL (1W: +8.97% | 1M: +20.40%) ABOVE TREND, TTKOM (1W: +7.88% | 1M: +17.00%) ABOVE TREND. Banking & Finance also leading: VAKBN (1W: +10.34% | 1M: +27.68%) ABOVE TREND, AKBNK (1W: +4.74% | 1M: +19.49%) ABOVE TREND.

3. Which sectors are lagging?
Construction & REIT is the weakest of winners but still positive: EKGYO (1W: +X% | 1M: +X%) ABOVE TREND (note: sector breadth lowest at +3.20%). Retail & Food is mild laggard but ABOVE TREND: MGROS (1W: +3.65% | 1M: +7.01%) ABOVE TREND, BIMAS (1W: +1.70% | 1M: +10.66%) ABOVE TREND.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

4. Top Performing Stocks?
FROTO (1W: +12.48% | 1M: +27.42%) ABOVE TREND; TRALT (1W: +11.19% | 1M: +12.92%) ABOVE TREND; VAKBN (1W: +10.34% | 1M: +27.68%) ABOVE TREND; TOASO (1W: +9.86% | 1M: +21.03%) ABOVE TREND; SASA (1W: +9.49% | 1M: +15.90%) ABOVE TREND.

5. Worst Performing Stocks?
MGROS (1W: +3.65% | 1M: +7.01%) ABOVE TREND; GARAN (1W: +2.61% | 1M: +11.40%) ABOVE TREND; ULKER (1W: +2.14% | 1M: +2.21%) ABOVE TREND; BIMAS (1W: +1.70% | 1M: +10.66%) ABOVE TREND; TUPRS (1W: +1.68% | 1M: +0.45%) ABOVE TREND.

6. Momentum Stocks?
FROTO (1W: +12.48% | 1M: +27.42%) ABOVE TREND; TRALT (1W: +11.19% | 1M: +12.92%) ABOVE TREND; VAKBN (1W: +10.34% | 1M: +27.68%) ABOVE TREND; TOASO (1W: +9.86% | 1M: +21.03%) ABOVE TREND; TCELL (1W: +8.97% | 1M: +20.40%) ABOVE TREND.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

7. Banking Sector Outlook?
Banks are strong and confirmed: AKBNK (1W: +4.74% | 1M: +19.49%) ABOVE TREND, GARAN (1W: +2.61% | 1M: +11.40%) ABOVE TREND, ISCTR (1W: +4.65% | 1M: +25.32%) ABOVE TREND, VAKBN (1W: +10.34% | 1M: +27.68%) ABOVE TREND, TSKB (1W: +7.55% | 1M: +10.18%) ABOVE TREND. Maintain exposure to large banks for yield and cyclicality.

8. Industrial Sector Outlook?
Heavy industry showing broad strength: FROTO (1W: +12.48% | 1M: +27.42%) ABOVE TREND, TOASO (1W: +9.86% | 1M: +21.03%) ABOVE TREND, EREGL (1W: +0.33% | 1M: +15.50%) ABOVE TREND, ARCLK (1W: +8.50% | 1M: +18.27%) ABOVE TREND. Industrial cyclicals remain prime beneficiaries of risk-on flows.

9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?
Energy & Chemicals are constructive: SASA (1W: +9.49% | 1M: +15.90%) ABOVE TREND, TRALT (1W: +11.19% | 1M: +12.92%) ABOVE TREND, TUPRS (1W: +1.68% | 1M: +0.45%) ABOVE TREND, SISE (1W: +5.22% | 1M: +28.09%) ABOVE TREND. Watch commodity/FX sensitivity for volatility around macro prints.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

10. Portfolio Recommendation?
Risk-on stance: overweight cyclicals (Autos, Heavy Industry), select Tech & Banks; trim low-beta defensives if needed. Keep cash buffer for short-term profit-taking and monitor FX/liquidity flow triggers.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?
FROTO (1W: +12.48% | 1M: +27.42%) ABOVE TREND for momentum continuation; TCELL (1W: +8.97% | 1M: +20.40%) ABOVE TREND on sector rotation; VAKBN (1W: +10.34% | 1M: +27.68%) ABOVE TREND for bank-flow leadership; SASA (1W: +9.49% | 1M: +15.90%) ABOVE TREND for commodity sensitivity.

12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?
Technology & Telecom for momentum confirmation; Banking & Finance for rate/FX sensitivity and flows; Heavy Industry for cyclicals and earnings updates.

13. Key Levels & Triggers?
Watch XU100 near its 20-day MA for pullback support and recent highs for resistance; major catalysts are domestic CBRT communications, FX liquidity/flow headlines, US PMI/CPI prints and oil moves. Earnings and sector-specific news (auto orders, polymer margins) are likely short-term triggers.

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
Low-volatility, full-breadth RISK-ON market: cyclicals, tech and banks leading with broad confirmation. Opportunity in high-momentum names (FROTO, TCELL, VAKBN, SASA) but manage position sizes around FX and macro catalysts.
